author: Alastair Walker
description: Pale green in colour with a refreshing bitter/sour sweet profile.
name: First Post
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
22.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a spear of ice)
